Key Match Events: Pete Alonso hit a three-run home run in the ninth inning to give the Mets a 3-2 lead
Post-Match Reflections: Mets manager Carlos Mendoza predicted that Pete Alonso would have a big hit in the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets will now face the Philadelphia Phillies in the NL Division Series
Others: Jose Butto struggled in the ninth inning, allowing back-to-back home runs to the Brewers
